title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. The appearance of the text fields on the Info page is not consistent across different platforms. On motif platforms, the text fields have automatic borders which make them look like user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, the text fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out in a visually unappealing way.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields on the Info page have automatic borders which make them look like user input targets. On Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, the text fields on the Info page have different colored backgrounds that make them stand out in a visually unappealing way.
EB: The text fields on the Info page should have a consistent appearance across all platforms. They should not have automatic borders on motif platforms and should have the same background color on all platforms.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a project 
2. Right-click on the project 
3. Click on the 'Properties' option 
4. Navigate to the Info page 
5. Observe the appearance of the readonly text fields (e.g. Path, Type)
